org.modelio.api.modelio.pattern

Interface IPatternService


  • public interface IPatternService
    Represents a project's catalog of patterns.
    Since:
    3.3.4

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IPatternService.PatternException
      Thrown when a pattern execution fails.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Install a pattern into the catalog and load it.

      Execute a pattern with the given parameters.
      void applyPattern(java.lang.String pattern, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
      Execute a pattern with the given parameters.

      Check that all module and model components dependencies are resolved before applying a pattern.

      Export a pattern.

    • Method Detail

      • exportPattern

        void exportPattern(Package pattern,
                   java.nio.file.Path patternPath)
            throws IPatternService.PatternException
        Export a pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern to export.
        patternPath - output path for the export.
        Throws:
        IPatternService.PatternException - when the Pattern can't be exported.

      • addPattern

        void addPattern(java.nio.file.Path patternPath)
         throws IPatternService.PatternException
        Install a pattern into the catalog and load it.

        If the pattern already exists in the catalog, it is replaced.

        Parameters:
        patternPath - path to a valid .umlt file.
        Throws:
        IPatternService.PatternException - when the given file doesn't contain a valid pattern.

      • getPatterns

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getPatterns()
        Get all available patterns.
        Returns:
        a collection of pattern names.

      • getPatterns

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getPatterns(java.util.Collection<MObject> elements)
        Get patterns applicable on these elements from the catalog.
        Parameters:
        elements - the model elements to filter the patterns with.
        Returns:
        a collection of pattern names.

      • removePattern

        void removePattern(java.lang.String pattern)
            throws IPatternService.PatternException
        Remove a pattern from the catalog.
        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern to remove.
        Throws:
        IPatternService.PatternException - when no pattern with this name is found in the catalog.

      • applyPattern

        void applyPattern(java.lang.String pattern,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
           throws IPatternService.PatternException
        Execute a pattern with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        pattern - name of the pattern to execute.
        parameters - the parameters for the pattern to run.
        Throws:
        IPatternService.PatternException - when the pattern execution fails.

      • canApplyPattern

        boolean canApplyPattern(java.lang.String pattern)
                 throws IPatternService.PatternException
        Check that all module and model components dependencies are resolved before applying a pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - the name of the pattern to execute.
        Returns:
        true when all module and model components the pattern depends on are resolved. false if at least one of them is missing.
        Throws:
        IPatternService.PatternException - when the pattern execution fails.

      • applyPattern

        void applyPattern(java.nio.file.Path patternPath,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
           throws IPatternService.PatternException
        Execute a pattern with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        patternPath - the jar of the pattern to execute.
        parameters - the parameters for the pattern to run.
        Throws:
        IPatternService.PatternException - when the pattern execution fails.
